Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until hot; fry tortillas individually until golden brown, about 2 to 3 minutes per side. Use tongs to transfer the fried tortillas to a baking sheet.
Spread salsa over each fried tortilla and sprinkle with Cheddar and Parmesan cheeses.
Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese has melted, approximately 8 minutes.

We have calculated the nutritional content of the frying oil using a retention value of 10% post-cooking. The precise amount may vary based on factors such as cooking duration, temperature, ingredient density, and the specific type of oil utilized.
